card.name: CW - GCCW127 - Uploading app time out

data.text:
@neilbosworth @cobuspienaar @yasserogier @gillianoberholzer @stefanbar 

Well the server is taking more strain than it used to, but speeding up server will not necessarily solve the problem here.

There need to be looked at the procedures currently in place as well as the code in use.

We have been seriously fixing and streamlining code the last month, but we haven't gone around to look at it all. Upliftment app is one area that we haven't looked at yet.

We might even need to consider moving the file processes off to a separate server, currently they are shared with the front end.
